website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced shower doors with a classic framed look, but some quality concerns about the durability.
pros: Features a simplistic, traditional framed look
Available in option of glass or hardware finish
cons: Doesn't feel quite as sturdy as others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Like a number of others who have reviewed this product, I experienced an exploding shower door during installation, even though I was especially careful in handling the glass doors. Perhaps it was damaged in shipping. Either way, Amazon was of no help in offering a replacement without me first returning the product, failing to understand the fact that I had already secured, adhered, and sealed the frame into my shower after cutting the frame to fit perfectly. In short, spend more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: JSZ

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. Ordered a replacement and it takes 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace my brass shower door and as soon as we hung up the glass door, the glass door completely shattered in thousands of small pieces. Glass door must be defective. So disappointed. Ordered a replacement and it takes 4 weeks. I already waited 3 weeks for this order. Will try again with replacement
customer_reviews.author: Janine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of dents and dings.
customer_reviews.text: My shower doors arrived with several dents and dings. Unfortunately I already had a contractor set up to install it. Rather than spend another week waiting for a new one I had the dents straightened as good as they could be and installed it anyway. Please unpack and check yours out before having a contractor come.
customer_reviews.author: Alan NC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The installation requires skills, tools, and experience. If you do not possess these attributes, have them professionally installed. After receiving and opening the box we found the frame rails missing. Basco required us to send them photos to prove the parts were missing. They shipped us the missing rails UPS ground taking an additional week. All and all the shower doors look good and we are happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: O's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Did the job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if the walls are level, but it was a retro fit project and the walls are anything but. Still works, but took some effort. When cutting to fit, keep tolerances close or you'll have fitment issues. Looks good and operates as expected. Better directions for installation needed as I had issues with rubber orientation. Otherwise, looks good on shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concerns resolved.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews about glass breakage I was concerned. I ordered two for two bath remodels. Both arrived and no issues with installing the first one. My only complaint is installing the two small pulls on the edge of the doors as the edges of tempered glass is where it is most valuable to shattering.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price for a Quality Shower Door!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sower door for the price! I was a little concerned with ordering a glass shower door online, but all went well. It arrived via UPS with no issues. Instructions were easy to follow and installation was not hard at all. Door looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Be weary of the box when delivered, doors may be damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doors once installed, but be careful. Box is not suitable for shipping, so product may be damaged when received. I had to get a replacement ordered because of bent brackets and stress fracture in one of the glass doors. Would have given a higher rating, but the packing is not good for shipping and can lead to problems. Be AWARE
customer_reviews.author: Redskins fan

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a challenge to say the least. I’ve had to remove the doors three times now as the glass slides out of the “clamps” WOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great solid heavy shower door.
customer_reviews.text: The door arrived ahead of schedule. Installation was straight forward. Client very happy with quality and fit. This door is made of thick glass which makes the doors nice and heavy. Good smooth operating sturdy feel when opening/closing.
customer_reviews.author: Czech Pls

customer_reviews.title: header was damaged
customer_reviews.text: the final piece the top of doors was a place that would cut finger. I would like that one piece replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Someone had previously purchased this item and made adjustments and cuts to the frame AND THEN RETURNED IT/ PROBLEM I HAD TO BE STUCK EITH A DEFORMED SHOWER BECAUSE MY CONTRACTOR COULD NOT WAIT FOR ME TO SEND THE DEFECTIVE SHOWER BACK AND WAIT FOR A NEW ONE, VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doors are just what I expected. My contractor installed ...
customer_reviews.text: Doors are just what I expected. My contractor installed them with no problem Came without the handle. Hardware for installing the handle was included but not the bar. Waiting to hear from manufacturer to replace part.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Lory

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful.. Fit my new shower perfectly, color matches the rest of the bathroom..
customer_reviews.author: Jina M.

customer_reviews.title: Glass is capable of shattering
customer_reviews.text: the glass shattered in my hands as I lifted it to install in the frame. Dangerous!!! Cut my hand
customer_reviews.author: ben ramsey

customer_reviews.title: If I had it to do over again, I would go with an open walk in on one side with no moving parts.
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled the guest bathroom to put htis in. It doesn't seem sturdy and I worry about the door falling. If I had it to do over again, I would go with an open walk in on one side with no moving parts. I also would situate the shower control near the walk in side instead of under the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Panda

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought the doors 2 months ago. Before we could take the door out of the box, the glass exploded in pieces. The glass was not broken or over heated. The instructions was missing every other page
customer_reviews.author: katina snyder

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged and missing all hardware
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, I had to order a replacement and now I have to pack a fragile glass door that will take a while with a torn box. smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Took out tub and did a walk in shower, these doors are the perfect compliment
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bear

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect, came delivered to the house, with detailed instructions I was able to do it myself...
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Backhaus

customer_reviews.title: do not buy a Basco product
customer_reviews.text: the worst thing I have done this year was to buy a Basco shower door
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After a few months on its own the glass door broke with no one even touching it
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Ibarra Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Door hinges fell of and shattered glass about a month after I installed it. I have read where this has happened to someone else. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bandy

customer_reviews.title: We love our doors
customer_reviews.text: We love our doors. It works effortlessly and looks nice. We ordered it through Amazon and it literally took us 2 months to get it. This is the first time Amazon was not efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy installation an neither a difficult one
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy installation an neither a difficult one, bathroom looks great now and the door is well made with good quality parts
customer_reviews.author: Santoball Allen, TX

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: This shower more than met our expectations. It was within our budget and was the final touch for our remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: thomas g. cooper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doors are slightly thinner than expected but works well in our newly remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: F. Celada

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has no instructions :-((
customer_reviews.text: Besides Amazon's POOR item presentation, I am very pleased. I could not find the installation guide with the product. Basco's model list doesn't coincide with Amazon's description so I had to look further. Luckily Homedepot.com has a professional presentation with all necessary documentation on their website. Thank you Home Depot.com! Amazon, please get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible glass all over😡
customer_reviews.text: Door hinges fell off one week after install glass shattered .this was a complete loss terrible scare very unhappy with product trying to reach Amazon to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: shirley mele

customer_reviews.title: Missing Vinyl shim in the brackets
customer_reviews.text: The door came with the brackets instaled but after two months we started noticing it was not opening softly, next thing we know the door came down, one of the brackets came off on each door. We called the person that installed, and after taking the brackets off to replace them, we found out that only one had the vinyl shim. So far we had two spend $ 67 buying new brackets from Basco, ...SURPRISE, the shims were not included, so I just ordered $ 14 more. THE DOOR LOOKS PRETTY QUALITY SUCKS DONT BUY IT. `
customer_reviews.author: Sara Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good product and looks nice just bad packaging and missing roller
customer_reviews.text: Overall a quality product, it was easy for me to install. Not too happy about the bronze piece on end of handle was all scratched and a roller was missing!!! The package arrived all beat up thank goodness the glass was ok. A few spots on the bronze were scuffed due to terrible packaging. If you are the owner of this product, please send me a roller! Kinda hard to put up a door without that. Didn’t see a way to call the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is fine but the wrong one was delivered - I ordered obscure glass & got clear glass.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t tell until I opened the shipping carton as there’s no description on the outside. By then it was too late. Repacking it for return shipment would be too big a hassle so I just kept the clear glass door. Not a happy experience. I raise the issue for attention so same mistakes wouldn’t repeat to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Way Long

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: If IKEA made a shower door, this would be it. Only after 3 delivery attempts and 3 weeks later did we receive a door that was moderately functional. The design of the door and cheap quality of parts make assembly an enormous pain. Long story short, I’d forgo saving a few bucks and go to your local big box store. I’m not putting the blame on Amazon, only saying that trying to deliver a 90 pound piece of glass & crappy parts is not meant for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hedberg

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shower Doors Ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have bought and installed many glass shower doors over the past 25 years and these are by far the worst doors we have ever installed. The packaging is less than enough for shipping glass doors. The shipper returned the first set and we took the second set and after installation they are extremely flimsy. Don't waste your money. We will be replacing them sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

product_meta.title: Basco Classic Sliding Shower Door, Fits 56-60 inch opening, Clear Glass, Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Oil-Rubbed Bronze| Style:Clear GlassBasco Classic glass shower enclosures enhance the look of any bathroom with bypass shower panels free from aluminum framing. Both 3/16 inch glass panels move within the enclosure. One panel includes a pull handle for one edge of the glass and the other panel has a towel bar that wraps around the panel. All Basco shower enclosures are backed by a Limited Lifetime Warranty. Moderate DIY Skills are recommended for installation of the shower enclosure. To reduce water we recommend placing the interior panel to be positioned closed to the shower head. Ensure your measurements are precise and finished wall material is in place before measuring for your shower door. Tools needed to install the door are: Tape measure, level, hacksaw, drill,7/64 inch, 1/8 inch, ¼ inch drill bits, #2 Philips screwdriver, 3/16 inch wrench, sharp knife, and caulking (clear silicone recommended) Optional tools include a miter box for cutting parts to length, files, center punch, and masking tape. At Basco Shower Enclosures, our goal is to create a remarkable experience for you. Because the shower is everything, our team of design engineers and precision craftsmen create a comprehensive family of shower enclosures we’re proud to brand with the Basco name. We make the selection of your shower door easy and offer helpful and responsive customer service to answer all of your questions.

This door can be applied to Fiberglass or tile shower bases; Shower bases and or walls not included
